sparklyballs/websync: This application while fully functional, does have the ability to cause potential data loss if used incorrectly.  This container is currently being used as a beta for a possible upcoming linuxserver.io version.
digitalman2112/duc: While still functional, this application appears to have been abandoned
tobbenb/tvheadend-stable: Deprecated Version (V3.9) - Use author's tvheadend container for V4 stable releases
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Steini: Expert Only: Not recommended for the casual user
https://raw.github.com/bergware/dynamix/: USING THIS PLUGIN ON DISKS FORMATTED IN REISERFS MAY LEAD TO SYSTEM INSTABILITY. IT IS ADVISED TO USE XFS
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Squidl: Development has ceased on this plugin.  Advised to use Dynamix File Integrity Checker instead
gfjardim/crashplan-desktop: This docker app has been merged with the Crashplan application.  There is now no longer any need to install this app.  This app will soon be deprecated
rix1337/docker-copy: This application will cease to operate after May 1st, 2016
